text: On the spec page, if I click away from highlighted text outside of the text input area, the "Discuss" button remains until I click somewhere in the text input area. Clicking ANYWHERE on the page should cause the discuss button to disappear.

proposedTasks.title: Dismiss 'Discuss' popover on any click outside the highlighted text
proposedTasks.description:
Currently the 'Discuss' button that appears when the user highlights text in the PRD viewer only disappears when the user clicks inside the chat text-input area. It should dismiss on any `mousedown` or `pointerdown` event that lands outside the popover itself and outside the currently highlighted text range.

Acceptance criteria:
- Clicking anywhere on the page outside the Discuss popover and the active text selection causes the popover to disappear and the text selection to clear.
- Clicking inside the Discuss popover (e.g. the button itself) still triggers the discuss action as before.
- Clicking inside the chat text-input area still dismisses the popover (existing behavior preserved).
- If the user creates a new text selection elsewhere in the PRD, the old popover dismisses and a new one appears at the new selection.
- No regressions to the discuss flow itself (highlighting text  clicking Discuss  text appears in chat input).

taskTitles: Dismiss 'Discuss' popover on any click outside the highlighted text
